bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: ① Etiological Agent. of feng xie 風邪 , wind evil, and/or bugs/worms causing tooth diseases. Wai tai mi yao 外台秘要 22 Recipe Entry Cui shi liao ya teng fang 崔氏療牙疼方 , Mr. Cui’s recipe to cure toothache: 齒痛不問風蟲，無不瘥 , “Effective for toothache regardless whether it was caused by wind and/or bugs/worms ”.

② Pathological Condition brought about by wind and/or bugs/worms . Pu ji fang 普濟方 70: 地骨皮湯，治牙 齒風蟲 , “A decoction with di gu pi cures teeth afflicted by wind and/or bugs/ worms ”. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 uses feng chong 風蟲 mainly to refer to tooth diseases.
